src:
Ajax Unggul 3-1 atas Chelsea di Babak Pertama
06 Nov 2019, 03:55 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ajax permalukan Chelsea 3-1 di babak pertama. (AP Photo/Frank Augstein)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Ajax Amsterdam tampil trengginas dan berhasil unggul 3-1 atas Chelsea pada babak pertama lanjutan fase grup Liga Champions di Stamford Bridge, (Rabu (6/11) dini hari WIB.Tim tamu tampaknya berhasrat balas dendam atas kekalahan 0-1 dari Chelsea di Belanda. Skuat arahan Erik ten Hag tampil agresif sejak menit awal dan seakan menyihir London.Buktinya, gawang Chelsea sudah kebobolan saat laga baru berusia dua menit. Gol tersebut tercipta karena kesalahan antisipasi Tammy Abraham yang membuat bola masuk ke gawang sendiri.Dua menit berselang Chelsea berhasil menyamakan kedudukan lewat eksekusi penalti Jorginho. Wasit menunjuk titik putih setelah Christian Pulisic dilanggar Veltman di area terlarang.Abraham sempat membuat publik London bergemuruh pada menit ke-13. Namun, gol tersebut dianulir karena ia dianggap offside.Ajax kembali memimpin di menit ke-20 lewat sundulan Quincy Promes memanfaatkan umpan silang tajam dari Hakim Ziyech.Ziyech kemudian membuat fan Chelsea terdiam pada menit ke-35. Sepakan pojok Ziyech lebih dulu membentur tiang sebelum bola mengenai wajah kiper Kepa Arrizabalaga dan masuk ke gawang. Gol tersebut tercatat karena bunuh diri Arrizabalaga.Upaya Chelsea untuk memperkecil kedudukan urung terwujud hingga babak pertama usai. The Blues tertinggal 1-3 dari tim tamu.Susunan pemain Chelsea vs Ajax:Chelsea XI (4-2-3-1): Kepa Arrizabalaga; Cesar Azpilicueta (c), Kurt Zouma, Fikayo Tomori, Marcos Alonso; Jorginho, Mateo Kovacic; Willian, Mason Mount, Christian Pulisic; Tammy Abraham.Ajax XI (4-2-3-1): Andre Onana; Noussair Mazraoui, Joel Veltman, Daley Blind, Nicolas Tagliafico; Donny van de Beek, Lisandro Martinez; David Neres, Hakim Ziyech, Quincy Promes; Dusan Tadic (c). (jun)
text:
Ajax Superior 3-1 over Chelsea in the First Round
Nov 6 2019, 3:55 a.m., https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ajax embarrassed Chelsea 3-1 in the first round. (AP Photo / Frank Augstein)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Ajax Amsterdam performed trengginas and managed to win 3-1 over Chelsea in the first round continued Champions League group phase at Stamford Bridge, (Wednesday (6/11) early morning hrs. The guest team seems eager for revenge for the defeat 0 -1 from Chelsea in the Netherlands, with Erik ten Hag's squad appearing aggressive since the early minutes and seeming to bewitch London. The proof is that Chelsea's goal had conceded when the match was only two minutes old. "Two minutes later Chelsea managed to equalize through Jorginho's penalty. The referee pointed to the spot after Christian Pulisic was violated by Veltman in the restricted area. took the lead in the 20th minute with a header from Quincy Promes utilizing a sharp cross from Hakim Ziyech. Ziyech then made Che's fan lsea was silent in the 35th minute. Ziyech's corner first hits the post before the ball hits the goalkeeper Kepa Arrizabalaga's face and into the goal. The goal was recorded due to suicide Arrizabalaga. Chelsea's efforts to minimize the position failed to materialize until the first half ended. The Blues are 1-3 behind the visitors. Chelsea vs Ajax players: Chelsea XI (4-2-3-1): Head of Arrizabalaga; Cesar Azpilicueta (c), Kurt Zouma, Fikayo Tomori, Marcos Alonso; Jorginho, Mateo Kovacic; Willian, Mason Mount, Christian Pulisic; Tammy Abraham. Ajax XI (4-2-3-1): Andre Onana; Noussair Mazraoui, Joel Veltman, Daley Blind, Nicolas Tagliafico; Donny van de Beek, Lisandro Martinez; David Neres, Judge Ziyech, Quincy Promes; Dusan Tadic (c). (jun)
